name: Rogue Robot Repair
description:
A quick, mini-boss battle between a wrench-shooting cannon and a malfunctioned, rogue robot!  Use the correct wrench to repair the robot to 100% functionality!  Bring the robot down to 0% functionality and it's game over!

A game made by Justin DiLeonardo for Global Game Jam 2020, a 48 hour worldwide game jam event!  The theme was "Repair".

Made in ClickTeam Fusion
